summary: To maintain a long term position in a cohesive, diverse environment, that promotes a professional environment and values employees and families. To obtain a teaching opportunity in grade levels EC - 4th grade.
skills: Communication with staff, parents and students

experience.title: Accounts Receivable Clerk
experience.description: Accounts receivable collection calls, answering questions for new customers, maintain a good relationship with clients; problem solving for clients in difficult situations; achieved weekly monetary goals. Proficient in Microsoft Word, Works, Excel, Internet Research, and PowerPoint.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Teaching all subjects to High School and Junior High; Coach for PE. Responsible for lesson planning, grades, and reports.

experience.title: Kindergarten Teacher
experience.description: Mathematics instruction (3 hours/day), Reading, Social Studies, Science; Writing.

experience.title: Daycare Lead Teacher
experience.description: Teaching 2, 3, 4 year old age group; Math, writing, letter and number recognition, listening skills, color recognition; preparing 4-year-olds for kindergarten; early scaffolding techniques to build knowledge and growth through play and activities.

experience.title: Accounts Receivable
experience.description: Customer service, data entry, making and receiving collection calls; daily reports; achieving set monetary goals.

experience.title: Cooperative Teacher
experience.description: Cooperative teaching for 3 and 4-year-olds and Kinder Ready for summer day camp; student teaching and observation.

experience.title: Student Teacher
experience.description: Student teaching in a self-contained 2nd grade classroom; taught reading, math, grammar, social studies, and science; engaged in individualized and small-group instruction; used technology including smart boards and overhead projectors.

experience.title: Special Service Associate
experience.company: The Kerrville Home Depot, Special Services
experience.description: Special services role; supported customers and staff; contributed to a positive learning environment.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Customer service and sales in Kerrville, TX.

experience.title: Policy Board Member
experience.description: Policy board involvement; school policy, employment, and safety concerns.
